title: Mini-Ep 166: No Scrubs
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 166: No Scrubs
itunes:subtitle: Kate is slugging and loving it, Doree soaks up the relaxation in another bath, and listeners send their weekly scrub down routine, tell us why they're growing out their greys, and ask about bikini waxing. Activity of the Week: Scrub yo...
description:
Kate is slugging and loving it, Doree soaks up the relaxation in another bath, and listeners send their weekly scrub down routine, tell us why they're growing out their greys, and ask about bikini waxing. 


Activity of the Week: Scrub yourself


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
